name: Focus Pets
description:
This is a work in progress for a productivity app.  Focus pets was made for the Team dog pit virtual pet jam.  It is essentially a stop to help you focus.

Controls :

Arrow keys or mouse to move

Z or click to select

Plugins Used: 

Yanfly - https://yanflyengineplugins.itch.io/yanfly-engine-plugins-full-collection
